text.jpText:
おや、トレーナーさん。
これはねぇ、大根のぽりぽりさんよ～。
text.enText:
Oh, trainer. This is hey, it's a daikon 
radish, Pori-Pori-Pori-San～.

text.jpText:
昔っからこれに目がなくてねぇ。
寮のぬか床で漬けさせてもらっとるんじゃ。
text.enText:
I've always had a thing for it. I pickle them 
in the beds in my dormitory.

text.jpText:
試しに夕食に出したら
ぽりぽり漬けおいしいって、
評判じゃったんよ～。
text.enText:
When I served it for dinner, it was 
well-received as a delicious pickled dish.

text.jpText:
たくさん漬けたつもりだったんじゃけど、
最近じゃ足りなくなることも多くてねぇ。
text.enText:
I thought I pickled a lot, 
but lately I often run out.

text.jpText:
み～んな育ちざかりじゃもんねぇ。
お腹いっぱい食べられるよう、
今日は山盛り漬けてあげるつもりよ～！
text.enText:
We are all growing up, aren't we? 
So that they can eat as much as they 
can. I'm going to pickle a lot today 
so they can eat their fill～!
